colorMap.Appearance.colors.colPrimaryHover: (prefer ColourUtils.mix with Colours.palette.m3primary and tPalette or use Colours.palette.m3primary)

notes.purpose: Maps color tokens used by end4/ii Appearance to Caelestia's Colours/Colours.tPalette equivalents.
notes.usage: Use this file as a lookup when porting components: replace Appearance.colors.* with the mapped Colours.* value. Add fallbacks (literal hex) if needed when singletons may be undefined at load time.
notes.author: copilot
notes.caution: Some tokens are conceptually different (layer vs palette). Verify visually after replacement and prefer tPalette for layered/transparent variants, palette for core M3 values. If you see a missing token, add it here before editing QML files.
